trans-unit.source: Represents a perspective projection camera.
trans-unit.target: 表示透视投影摄像机。

trans-unit.source: PerspectiveCamera specifies a projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface.
trans-unit.target: PerspectiveCamera 指定的投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]可视化图面。

trans-unit.source: This projection includes perspective foreshortening.
trans-unit.target: 此投影包括透视收缩。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the PerspectiveCamera describes a frustrum whose sides converge toward a point on the horizon.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，PerspectiveCamera 描述边集中点的平截体。

trans-unit.source: Objects closer to the camera appear larger, and objects farther from the camera appear smaller.
trans-unit.target: 对象靠近相机出现更大，而较远的位置照相机对象出现较小。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示正交投影和透视缩短相机投影之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正射透视投影](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "射透视投影")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref> class using the specified position, direction, and field of view.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref>类使用指定的位置、 方向和视野。

trans-unit.source: Point3D that specifies the camera's position.
trans-unit.target: 指定的照相机的位置的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that specifies the direction of the camera's projection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的照相机的投影的方向的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that specifies the upward direction according to the perspective of the onlooker.
trans-unit.target: 指定根据观察的角度来看的向上方向的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Width of the camera's angle of projection, specified in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 以度为单位指定的映射的照相机的角度的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the camera's horizontal field of view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，表示的照相机的水平视野。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, "field of view" is the horizontal bounds of the camera's projection between the camera's position and the image plane.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，"视野"是之间的照相机的位置和映像平面的照相机的投影的水平边界。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The camera's horizontal field of view, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 照相机的水平视野、 以度为单位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `45`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `45`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
